overview.en: Stemming from Bitcoin Cash, BSV is a hard fork (community-activated update to the protocol or code) established as distinct from BCH after the network upgrade scheduled for November 15th, 2018 resulted in a hash war determining the chains would be split.
overview.zh: BSV（Bitcoin Satoshi Vision）是遵循中本聪白皮书原始设计和协议稳定的比特币，实现原定的大规模链上扩容愿景，旨在成为全球通用的点对点电子现金与价值数据传输网络。Bitcoin SV中的“SV”是Satoshi Vision（中本聪愿景）的缩写。Bitcoin SV提供了一种全新的全节点比特币现金（BCH）实现方式，旨在实现中本聪（Satoshi Nakamoto）最初在其比特币白皮书中所设定的愿景。
